Package org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.external

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RobotStateMonitor
    Instances of RobotStateMonitor can be registered with the Callback of UpdateUI in order to receive notifications when certain event transitions happen within the robot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SoundPlayingRobotMonitor
    SoundPlayingRobotMonitor is an implementation of RobotStateMonitor that plays sounds at certain event transitions within the Robot Controller application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SoundPlayingRobotMonitor.Sound
